'''1.16.201''' is a hotfix to {{BE}}, released on December 15, 2020, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360053622851|title=Minecraft - 1.16.201 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=December 15, 2020}}</ref> This is the final version released in 2020.

It is the last Bedrock version to be released for the Fire Phone.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed the game failing to launch on multiple Windows 10 devices ({{bug|MCPE-102530}}).
* Double Chests placed at chunk borders no longer become partially invisible and don't crash the game when they are opened ({{bug|MCPE-106030}}).
* Shulker boxes no longer lose everything inside their inventory when undyed using a cauldron ({{bug|MCPE-108196}}).
* Fixed main menu buttons being invisible on older AMD graphics cards.
* Fixed a crash that could occur after suspending and resuming while creating new world on Android.
